name: DBSecurityGroup
description: The AWS::RDS::DBSecurityGroup type is used to create or update an Amazon RDS DB Security Group. For more information about DB Security Groups, see Working with DB Security Groups in the Amazon Relational Database Service Developer Guide.

properties.name: EC2VpcId
properties.description: The Id of VPC. Indicates which VPC this DB Security Group should belong to.

properties.name: DBSecurityGroupIngress
properties.description: Network ingress authorization for an Amazon EC2 security group or an IP address range.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags that you want to attach to the Amazon RDS DB security group.
